title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-1.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-1.1 - Application

State Regulations
(a) Every employer
in the hospitality industry must pay to each employee, as defined in this Part, at least the minimum wage rates provided in this Part. (b) The rates provided herein shall apply, unless otherwise stated, on and after January 1, 2011. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
146-1.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
